decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings and document title number(s): 4882 - BOX - COR - XX - DR - A - 0306 REV P04:Proposed East & North Elevations;4882 - BOX - COR - XX - DR - A - 0307 REV P06: Proposed South & West Elevations; DESIGN AND ACCESS STATEMNT; 581312- 4882-MAC-COR-XX-DR-A-0001:Existing Location Plan;581312-4882-SUT-COR-00-DR-S-2001-D0100 T01: MECHANICAL EQUIPMENT AND NEW SHED BASE LOCATION AND DETAILS;4882 - BOX - COR - XX - DR - A - 0301 REV P03: Existing Site Plan; 4882 - BOX - COR - XX - DR - A - 0302 REV P03:Existing Floor Plans;4882 - BOX - COR - XX - DR - A - 0303 REV P04: Existing Elevations; 4882 - BOX - COR - XX - DR - A - 0304 REV P06: Proposed Site Plan;4882 - BOX - COR - XX - DR - A - 0305 REV P03: Proposed Floor Plans
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise indicated on the hereby approved plans listed in Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings and special character of the Conservation Area, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
subdivision_of_building: Ground floor of the northern and southern elevations.

phasing_details.phase_detail: Commencement in combination with prior grant of permission Ref.216762FUL and 223191FUL

description: Installation of concrete plinths, plant and associated security / acoustic encasement on the northern and southern elevations
